attributes.action: I would like to get more envolved in classes instead of writting and reading
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People in classes these days don't just want to sit and read they want to get envolved. Now i am in year 8 myself and i understand people want to not just sit on the side lines!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
